text:
How to Sign a Document

Tense room; Raskolnikov, Razumihin, Nastasya present.  
Raskolnikov feels uncertain.  
Razumihin: “How can you do without signing?”  
Raskolnikov: “I don’t want the money.”  
Razumihin: “That’s nonsense! Just sign it.”  

---  

Raskolnikov hesitates; Nastasya watches quietly.  
Razumihin: “Don’t keep your visitor waiting.”  
Raskolnikov: “Stop, I’ll do it alone.”  

---  

Nastasya stands by, soup in hand.  
Raskolnikov: “Is there any soup?”  
Nastasya: “Some of yesterday’s.”  
Raskolnikov: “I know it by heart.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov experiences a mix of astonishment and terror as he navigates a mundane interaction involving money and food, questioning his grasp on reality.
